name: Midsummer Spells
description:
A quick jam game that wasn't as quick as intended.

How to play:

-Drag objects into the summon circle with mouse

-Move with WASD

-Press Tab to check recipes

-Find combinations

Credits

Pazi - Technical and 3D Art, Programming

Amortem - 2D Art

Poksy - Design

Henuli  - Programming, 3D Art
